Choose a lesson to start learning: Choose a lesson to start learning
Basic Greetings Description: Greetings are the foundation of any conversation. In this lesson, you'll learn the most common ways to greet people and be polite in everyday situations.
Family Members Description: Learn the basic words to talk about family members. These are essential for introducing your family and talking about relatives.
Food & Drinks Description: Learn essential vocabulary for foods and drinks. This lesson helps you order, cook, and talk about meals.
Daily Routines Description: Learn how to describe your daily routine, talk about time and schedules in Vietnamese.
Past Tense Verbs Description: This lesson focuses on using past tense verbs correctly in everyday conversations.
Business Communication Description: Learn professional vocabulary, expressions, and email/meeting etiquette in Vietnamese business contexts.
Introducing Yourself Description: Learn phrases for introducing yourself, asking for names, and talking about your hobbies and interests.
